scripts.build-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node && npm run build-transform
scripts.build-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node --optimize-fcs && npm run build-transform
scripts.build-node: node out/bundle.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.build-node-es: node --experimental-modules out-node/app.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.postbuild-dotnet: npx rollup out-node/app.js --file out/bundle.js --format umd --name Fable
scripts.build-bundle: node out/bundle.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.build-bundle-webpack: node out/webpack_bundle.min.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.build-test-node: node --experimental-modules out-node/app.js ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-test-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-test-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test --optimize-fcs && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-tests-node: node --experimental-modules out-node/app.js ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests && npm run build-tests-transform
scripts.build-tests-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests && npm run build-tests-transform
scripts.build-tests-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests --optimize-fcs && npm run build-tests-transform
